1.title: Welcome Adventurer
1.body: You are standing on a field full of giant trees. You can't see the top of the trees; it's mildly humid and hot. You could go: {{.goto}}.

2.title: You went east
2.body: The trees here are still lush and exotic. You hear a small river to the east. You could go: {{.goto}}
